mapper.insert: insert into slip_detail (slipdetailno, status, price, clientcard, slipnumber, establishcode) values (#{slipDetailNo},#{status},#{price},#{clientCard},#{slipNumber},#{establishCode})
mapper.select: SELECT SLIPDETAILNO, STATUS, PRICE, CLIENTCARD, SLIPNUMBER, ESTABLISHCODE FROM SLIP_DETAIL WHERE SLIPNUMBER = #{slipNumber}
SELECT SLIPDETAILNO, STATUS, PRICE, CLIENTCARD, SLIPNUMBER, ESTABLISHCODE FROM SLIP_DETAIL WHERE SLIPNUMBER = #{slipNumber}

SELECT status, price, establishcode FROM
( SELECT min(a.STATUS) status, sum(a.PRICE) price, a.ESTABLISHCODE FROM SLIP_DETAIL a, SLIP b WHERE a.slipnumber = b.slipnumber AND a.ESTABLISHCODE BETWEEN 101 AND 250 AND b.SLIPDATE <= LAST_DAY(to_date(#{chooseYear} || '/' || #{chooseMonth}, 'yyyy-mm')) and a.status = 0 group by a.establishcode union all SELECT min(a.STATUS) status, sum(a.PRICE) price, a.ESTABLISHCODE FROM SLIP_DETAIL a, SLIP b WHERE a.slipnumber = b.slipnumber AND a.ESTABLISHCODE BETWEEN 101 AND 250 AND b.SLIPDATE <= LAST_DAY(to_date(#{chooseYear} || '/' || #{chooseMonth}, 'yyyy-mm')) and a.status =1 group by a.establishcode ) ORDER BY establishcode

SELECT establishcode, debit, credit, debit-credit OperatorValue FROM (SELECT establishcode, NVL(sum(decode(status, 0, price)),0) debit, NVL(sum(decode(status, 1, price)),0) credit FROM( SELECT a.STATUS, sum(a.PRICE) price, a.ESTABLISHCODE FROM SLIP_DETAIL a, SLIP b WHERE a.slipnumber = b.slipnumber AND b.SLIPDATE <= LAST_DAY(to_date(#{chooseYear} || '/' || #{chooseMonth}, 'yyyy-mm')) group by a.establishcode, a.status) group by establishcode) order by establishcode
